response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,200,000 by potential buyers. Considering the immense benefits it offers and the return on investment it promises, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, I am willing to sell this product to you for $950,000. This special price represents a significant saving of $250,000 compared to the market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive price. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information to make your decision.", "product_price": 950000}
